Apply Now

Apply to HIMS Degree College

Take the first step towards your future. Our streamlined application process makes it easy to join our community of learners and achievers.

Application Fee: Rs. 500

Pay via EasyPaisa • Non-refundable

Application Process

Follow these simple steps to complete your application and join our community.

01

Complete Application

Fill out the online application form with your personal and academic information

02

Pay Application Fee

Pay Rs. 500 application fee via EasyPaisa and upload transaction receipt

03

Submit Documents

Upload required transaction receipt and provide transaction ID

04

Application Review

Our admissions team will review your application and documents

05

Receive Decision

Get notified of your admission decision within 1-2 weeks

Available Programs

Choose from our comprehensive 2-year programs designed for your academic success.

FSC Pre-Medical

2 Years
Available Seats:120
Core Subjects:

Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics

Foundation course for medical studies with comprehensive science curriculum and practical training

FSC Pre-Engineering

2 Years
Available Seats:100
Core Subjects:

Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry

Engineering foundation program with focus on core subjects and practical applications

Computer Science

2 Years
Available Seats:80
Core Subjects:

Mathematics, Computer Science, Physics

Modern computer science program with programming, software development, and technology training

Application Requirements

Make sure you have everything ready before starting your application.

Completed application form
Application fee payment (Rs. 500)
EasyPaisa transaction receipt
Valid transaction ID
Previous academic records
Personal and contact information
Father's name and family details
